message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional item. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Alice, I appreciate your offer but $12,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  This is a fair price considering my budget and the value I see in the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In light of that, I would like to counter with a price of $10,500 for the product. This still allows me to maintain a reasonable profit while being more flexible with your financial situation. I look forward to your consideration.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $10,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. This is my final offer.  If we can't agree on this, I'll have to move on to another seller.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I understand your financial constraints. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a price of $10,000 for the product. This price still allows me to achieve a reasonable profit while being more accommodating to your budget. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
